entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as he greets Harry, Ron, and Hermione.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the people Hagrid greets.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people Hagrid greets.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the people Hagrid greets.

entities.name: lavender brown
entities.description: Lavender Brown is introduced as she reacts to seeing the Blast-Ended Skrewts.

entities.name: slytherins
entities.description: The Slytherin group is mentioned as people who will want to see the Blast-Ended Skrewts.

relationships.description: Hagrid mentions that the Slytherins will want to see the Blast-Ended Skrewts.
Lavender Brown reacts with disgust to seeing the Blast-Ended Skrewts.
